I created a facet with an empty description, i.e.:

   <extension point="org.eclipse.wst.common.project.facet.core.facets" id="foo">
	    <project-facet id="myFacet">
	      <label>My Facet</label>
	      <description></description>
	    </project-facet>
            [...]
    </extension>

When I invoked the new project wizard, nothing happened, and there was an npe in the log. Seems like (a) the empty description should be handled, and (b) the facet framework should be more resilient and just ignore invalid facets, or at least pop a dialog with an error.

(the NPE is in the "caused by" stack, but I included the whole thing here)
